data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
RTP is a network transport protocol - one layer above UDP. Hence
    Net :: RTP !

    Structure will be very similar to my Net::SAP module. The Net::RTP
    module will be used to send and recieve the packets and there will
    be a Net::RTP::Packet module with methods to access the properties
    of the packets.
